body: @XKaizokuX Nhentai doujins are originally from e-hentai.org. On e-hentai.org, "gender bender" was changed to "gender change" due to "gender bender" used to be mutually exclusive with "body swap", which used to be very confusing. In addition, many people dislike "gender bender" doujin with elemets such as possession and bodyswap The tag "gender morph" is now a seperate one for only transformation from male to female and vice versa. Copy this comment to every hentai if anyone ask this question. Original forum thread: https://forums.e-hentai.org/index.php?showtopic=253088
ohhhh i see such a cultured brother
ls it a one way thing? Or would he change back if he used that again?
Why are we using gender change tags now?
